title: REPLAY: Ali Alder
itunes:title: REPLAY: Ali Alder
description:
Original Air Date: June 2, 2021


PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

 

This week Kate and Leisha catch up with friend and co-creator of Supergirl and The New Normal, Ali Adler, who Alice fromThe L-Word was based on. They discuss Ali’s appearance on Donahue for founding the first lesbian sorority, how writing Santana’s coming out story on Glee was taken from her real life experience, and why gay representation in media matters. They also answer listeners’ questions on art that changed them, guilty pleasures, and secret relationships.

 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: Email us: kateandleisha@gmail.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
